metadata.title: CVE-2018-20803 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which loop indefinitely inmathematics processing while retaining locks. This issue affects: MongoDBInc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.5; v3.6 versions prior to3.6.10; v3.4 versions prior to 3.4.19.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
